tags: we love these two people together
summary: Could you do green eyed epiphany and bodyguard au for winteriron??? You're writing is amazing btw
question: Could you do green eyed epiphany and bodyguard au for winteriron??? You're writing is amazing btw
answer:
I HAD THE WHOLE THING WRITTEN DOWN AND THEN I CLICKED THE WRONG PAGE…RIP ME

There were many things Tony knew about Bucky Barnes. 

1.) He was a competent bodyguard. Seriously. Tony hadn’t been able to rid of him yet, although he always said it was a matter of time. 

2.) Bucky looks good in suits. Tony never underestimate the whole “man in a uniform” thing until…now. The tie, the posture, damn. Tony definitely liked seeing his bodyguard so well-poised. (And well…other things.) 

3.) He had green in his eyes. Not a lot, but up close you noticed it. Tony is up close because there was an Assassination Attempt. Keyword: attempt. Bruce rather likes having a lively party and dancing with his husband in peace. The Hulk likes fighting. Best of both worlds, soon enough. 

“Why is it always you who somehow gets into the most trouble?” Bucky grunts, getting on the metal arm to check around. Okay, new kink: found. 

“I’m not exactly sure, maybe it’s because I’ve only ever turned green when sick,” he jabs. 

“What, no envy?” 

“Only for science conferences,” Tony amends. Bucky laughs, flinging a knife out at the attacker, pinning him to one of the tables that cost more than what they’re worth. “I should not find that hot,” Tony says with a sigh. 

“Tony!” Pepper calls. “Was there an attack? Are you hurt?” 

“Only my dancing, darling,” Tony responds. “Seriously, I was just about to request something fun. Salsa, maybe? I could’ve made that old bat Dame Rebecca faint, probably. Maybe. Depends on how opposed she is to obscenely homoerotic gestures.” 

“Health care wouldn’t cover it.” 

“Damn.” 

His eyes are drawn back to Bucky, who has one of his boots planted on the guy’s chest. Pepper nudges Tony. 

“No falling in love with your bodyguard until we don’t renew the contract.” 

“What me? In love? Pepper, darling, honey, I could never fall in love. I’m Tony Stark, Love is Nothing but a Hindrance to Me–” 

“You cried for fifteen minutes yesterday because you couldn’t go to Paris and meet the love of your life.” 

“That’s because I was at a low point!” 

“You had just watched Lady and the Tramp with Rhodey, you were hardly at a low point.” Tony smacks her on the arm as Bucky looks over, waving. “Just face it: you like him. A little. Well, a lot.” 

Bucky looks over at Tony, and then takes stock that Steve is walking over. 

“Me and Sharon got this, you go over to your guy,” he says, grinning. Bucky scowls. 

“Shut up, punk. He ain’t my guy.” 

“Yeah, because you make heart eyes at Wilson instead,” Sharon states sarcastically. “You should tell him.” 

“And what, ruin my job and my social life? He probably thinks I’m a nice guy to be a bodyguard.” 

He waves over at Tony, grinning. 

“Oh yeah, you totally aren’t liked back, wow,” Steve remarks. “Definitely not, how could Sharon and I encourage you like that? He doesn’t look love-struck at all.” Bucky flips him off, but goes over to talk. 

“Thank god you had your boots on,” Tony says. “Otherwise, Pepper would’ve killed me for my fashion faux pas, which was wearing a pink tie.” 

“It’s not bad, you just never pair it with gray.” 

“The moment I pair pink with gray is the day I take basic pictures from 2010, Pepper. I am unique, an individual–” 

“A weirdo?” Bucky offers. Tony holds a look of mock outrage, before flinging the tie off and undoing some of the buttons. 

Shouldn’t be as much of a look as Bucky thinks it is, but alright. 

Rhodey has fallen asleep on the couch, an old movie on rerun. Bucky thinks that Hedy might be in it, but not sure at this point. 

Tony looks more tired than he was, and Bucky stares at him for a moment. 

“Are you alright?” Tony straightens up, smiling softly. 

“Yeah, just a bit shaken up, you know?” Bucky knows. He’s been more shaken than a rattle for years now. He gets the sneaking suspicion that Tony is as well. 

“Rest well,” Bucky says. “I’ll be up.” 

And he is. He will be, for as long as Tony needs him.

summary:
Rhodey:I saw you hanging out with Stephen.
Tony:Its not what you think! 
Rhodey:isn't it? 
Tony:You know your the only one for...
body:
Rhodey:I saw you hanging out with Stephen.

Tony:Its not what you think!

Rhodey:isn’t it?

Tony:You know your the only one for me!

Rhodey:So I have no need to be jealous?

Tony:Yes, me and Stephen are just dating. He’s my boyfriend!

Rhodey:oh really? No best friend feelings involved?

Tony: None, Stephen is just the love of my life. Your my best friend.

Rhodey: I’m still the platonic love of your life, right?

Tony: Of course man.

tags: him and steve would totally get it
summary: Ok I have a weird question: Why do so many in the MCU fandom think Tony wouldn’t get nihilistic/gallows “guess I’ll die” type...
body: Ok I have a weird question: Why do so many in the MCU fandom think Tony wouldn’t get nihilistic/gallows “guess I’ll die” type humor and would constantly freak out whenever Peter would make those jokes? Like this guy is known for making jokes in/about super dangerous situations and when he found out he was dying, his response was to throw a huge party and get drunk off his ass. If anyone in the avengers would understand that kind of humor, it’d be him and hell he’d likely make those kind of jokes himself.

summary: Peter: “I’ve never been to Disneyland.” Tony: “Really?” Peter: “Yes.” Tony: “Me neither. But well. It’s for little children,...
body:
Peter: “I’ve never been to Disneyland.”

Tony: “Really?”

Peter: “Yes.”

Tony: “Me neither. But well. It’s for little children, isn’t it? Haha.”

Peter *sighing*: “I guess you’re right …”

3 days later:

Peter: “Mr. Stark? What are you doing here with a limousine and … oh my gosh, why are you wearing a Micky Mouse cap?!”

Tony: “Get in loser. We’re going to Disneyland.”

Peter: “No Way!!!“

(Aka: I have to write that fic sometime …)

Tony: “Really?”

Peter: “Yes.”

Tony: “Me neither. But well. It’s for little children, isn’t it? Haha.”

Peter *sighing*: “I guess you’re right …”

3 days later:

Peter: “Mr. Stark? What are you doing here with a limousine and … oh my gosh, why are you wearing a Micky Mouse cap?!”

Tony: “Get in loser. We’re going to Disneyland.”

Peter: “No Way!!!“

(Aka: I have to write that fic sometime …)

summary: Imagine MCU Peter Parker accidentally letting slip that he’s gonna miss a class trip because Aunt May can’t chaperone so then he...
body:
Imagine MCU Peter Parker accidentally letting slip that he’s gonna miss a class trip because Aunt May can’t chaperone so then he suddenly has to explain to his teachers why one of the Avengers volunteered to oversee the class camping trip or something like that.

Like imagine Peter being super embarrassed when all of his classmates are wondering why the fuck Thor, god of thunder and king of Asgard, is on their trip.

Or why Captain Steven Rogers is standing at attention as the teacher lists off all of the parents who volunteered to come.

Or like even the defenders, like imagine the principal asking why he thought a blind lawyer from Hell’s Kitchen was a suitable candidate for chaperoning a bunch of high schoolers.

Or Natasha comes along and all the kids are too afraid of her to say anything the whole time.

Imagine Peter trying to explain that his second choice after his legal guardian was known Kennedy Assassin, James Buchanan Barnes.

Imagine the principal trying to figure out how in the hell a student contacted S.H.I.E.L.D. agent Daisy Johnson for what basically amounts to a babysitter for a weekend bus trip.

Or even further and tie in Venom and have kids questioning why some off-the-rails San Francisco newsman signed on to help this random kid in Queens.

Like I love all the headcanons about the older superheroes deciding that this child is their responsibility but the domestic side of that is just hilarious

Add more if you think of it honestly

summary: Life's Greatest Blessing - Jessica_Wild - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
title: Life's Greatest Blessing - Jessica_Wild - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Hey, just wanted to link my stevetony ff! Give it a read if you’re up to it ♡


“That’s our fertile myrtle,” Clint jokes, smile creeping onto his face as he scoops up Harley to make place for Strange, “we should probably keep the two of them away from each other, ‘cause I’m convinced that at this stage, if Steve even so much as breathes a certain way, Tony’ll be knocked up with like, quintuplets or something.”

In which a slightly younger Tony and not-so-fresh-out-the-ice Steve are grossly in love and keep popping out babies and the Team actually IS a family.

Alternatively,

Natasha and Tony discover the meaning of family and happiness.

Alternatively,

Family
Life’s greatest blessing, a group that dreams, laughs, plays and loves together, those whom you can always count on, always present not only in the good times, the most precious gifts.

blog.name: lovelyirony
blog.title: sharon's a good character y'all are just mean
blog.description: icon by starkxs. name is jess, please send in a full prompt! thanks so much for stopping by, I appreciate it!

summary: 9 and 33 for the prompts please! WinterIron with Tony teaching Peter to dance at his studio and Buck walks in? Or something?...
question: 9 and 33 for the prompts please! WinterIron with Tony teaching Peter to dance at his studio and Buck walks in? Or something? Whatever you write I’ll love!💙💙💙 Thanks!
answer:
9.) Dance AU 33.) Baby fic

Dancing was a joy that Tony loved. He would dance anywhere, anytime. Peter was the same way, thank god. They wiggled their way through breakfast, twirled home from school. 

Tony teaches a class for young little dancers. They don’t do a lot professionally, but they do get a little sense of rhythm and fun from it, at least. 

Bucky Barnes and Natasha Romanov teach the competitive ballet team. They take at least first or second place every year, and neither suffer fools gladly. Tony has seen them dance with their students, everything precise and fast-paced. It made him miss how he used to dance. 

Sometimes, after dance classes, Tony and Peter dance together. Tony will show him how he used to dance, his posture still ramrod straight and feet light. 

Bucky sees it. Sees the grace, the positions…he had to be a professional. And he was teaching five year olds. It wasn’t bad, just…interesting. 

He sees him in the hallway. 

“Tony,” he calls. He turns around, and wow Bucky has never seen him up close. Gorgeous eyes, the exact type of eyes Bucky likes to lose himself in. Great form, fantastic figure, and not just from the ballet perspective. “I saw you dancing the other night…were you a professional?” 

Tony smiles, ushering Peter to go to the classroom. “Once, yeah. Doesn’t matter as much you think it does, sometimes.” 

Bucky thinks he knows what he’s talking about. 

They dance some more, after classes. They work well together, and Natasha rolls her eyes but asks Tony to demonstrate technique to some of the newcomers. 

To thank Tony, Bucky takes him and Peter out for dinner. 

They go out for dinners a lot more after that.

Bucky Barnes and Natasha Romanov teach the competitive ballet team. They take at least first or second place every year, and neither suffer fools gladly. Tony has seen them dance with their students, everything precise and fast-paced. It made him miss how he used to dance. 

Sometimes, after dance classes, Tony and Peter dance together. Tony will show him how he used to dance, his posture still ramrod straight and feet light. 

Bucky sees it. Sees the grace, the positions…he had to be a professional. And he was teaching five year olds. It wasn’t bad, just…interesting. 

He sees him in the hallway. 

“Tony,” he calls. He turns around, and wow Bucky has never seen him up close. Gorgeous eyes, the exact type of eyes Bucky likes to lose himself in. Great form, fantastic figure, and not just from the ballet perspective. “I saw you dancing the other night…were you a professional?” 

Tony smiles, ushering Peter to go to the classroom. “Once, yeah. Doesn’t matter as much you think it does, sometimes.” 

Bucky thinks he knows what he’s talking about. 

They dance some more, after classes. They work well together, and Natasha rolls her eyes but asks Tony to demonstrate technique to some of the newcomers. 

To thank Tony, Bucky takes him and Peter out for dinner. 

They go out for dinners a lot more after that.

trail.content_raw:
9.) Dance AU 33.) Baby fic

Dancing was a joy that Tony loved. He would dance anywhere, anytime. Peter was the same way, thank god. They wiggled their way through breakfast, twirled home from school. 

Tony teaches a class for young little dancers. They don’t do a lot professionally, but they do get a little sense of rhythm and fun from it, at least. 

Bucky Barnes and Natasha Romanov teach the competitive ballet team. They take at least first or second place every year, and neither suffer fools gladly. Tony has seen them dance with their students, everything precise and fast-paced. It made him miss how he used to dance.

Bucky sees it. Sees the grace, the positions…he had to be a professional. And he was teaching five year olds. It wasn’t bad, just…interesting. 

He sees him in the hallway. 

“Tony,” he calls. He turns around, and wow Bucky has never seen him up close. Gorgeous eyes, the exact type of eyes Bucky likes to lose himself in. Great form, fantastic figure, and not just from the ballet perspective. “I saw you dancing the other night…were you a professional?” 

Tony smiles, ushering Peter to go to the classroom. “Once, yeah. Doesn’t matter as much you think it does, sometimes.” 

Bucky thinks he knows what he’s talking about. 

They dance some more, after classes. They work well together, and Natasha rolls her eyes but asks Tony to demonstrate technique to some of the newcomers. 

To thank Tony, Bucky takes him and Peter out for dinner. 

They go out for dinners a lot more after that.
